channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump was surging after the Venezuela raid—then came Jerome Powell, Greenland and Minnesota. Now it feels like a ‘historic hinge moment’

item.title: Carney says Canada has no plans to pursue free trade agreement with China as Trump threatens tariffs
item.description: Carney said his recent agreement with China merely cuts tariffs on a few sectors that were recently hit with tariffs.

item.title: Trump Administration Tries to Control Minneapolis Shooting Narrative, and Winter Storm Shatters Records
item.description: Plus, High January is the new Dry January.

item.title: Local Prosecution Is the Answer to Federal Lawlessness
item.description: State and local prosecutions could produce deterrent effects that are so desperately needed now.

item.title: ‘We Are Creating the Conditions for a Catastrophe.’ Three Columnists on the Shooting of Alex Pretti in Minneapolis.
item.description: On immigration raids, the shooting death of Alex Pretti and where we go from here.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X Faces EU Inquiry Over Sexualized AI Images Generated by Grok
item.description: Regulators said the company’s lack of controls had led to the widespread use of deepfakes created with the chatbot Grok.

item.title: The $1,000 night out: Authentic Live is all-in on Gen Z’s obsession with the experience economy, hosting events with celebrities in tentpole moments

item.title: CEOs, long silent on Trump’s immigration crackdown, seem to hit their breaking point over killing of Alex Pretti in Minnesota
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: A Crisis of Confidence for ICE and Border Patrol as Clashes Escalate

item.title: At Least 18 Dead After Ferry Carrying 350 Sinks in the Philippines
item.description: Two dozen people were still missing after the vessel sank early Monday morning in Basilan Province.

item.title: A Winter Lull in the Fighting? Not in the Age of Drone Warfare.
item.description: Shifts in tactics and technology in Ukraine mean that the pace of fighting is no longer decided by whether tanks can navigate frozen fields.

item.title: In Venezuela, Freeing the Economy, but Nothing Else

item.title: In Xi’s China, Top General’s Fall Shows Precariousness of Power
